messages.title: We need real change in Britain.
messages.content: We have been failed by Gordon Brown's disastrous Government. They have to go. But would a Conservative Government really make things better?

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats will scrap income tax on the first £10,000 earned, paid for by closing down on the very rich. Tories promise large early cuts to public spending that risk tipping us back into recession.
The Tories took years to come clean about the tax status of their deputy Chairman Lord Ashcroft. Introduce a fair voting system, stop tax dodgers from funding political parties.

Conservatives are planning yet more large-scale reorganization, paid for by taking money from our existing schools. Liberal Democrats would cut class sizes, stop such threats and protect what we don't need.

mentions.candidate: It’s Martin Tod or the Conservatives here
mentions.tacticalSituation: Only Martin Tod can beat the Conservatives here. Labour can't win here.

issues.economy: The Liberal Democrats will scrap income tax on the first £10,000 earned... The Tories promise early cuts to public spending that risk tipping us back into recession.
issues.education: The Conservatives are planning yet more large-scale reorganization... Instead the Liberal Democrats would cut class sizes...
issues.governance: The Tories took years to come clean about the tax status of their deputy Chairman Lord Ashcroft.

images.caption: Graph showing Lib Dem 48%, Con 38%, Lab 4%, Green Party 1%
